title: Textile, "Mica", ca. 1995–98
medium:
Medium: polyester fiber (weft), polyester slit film (warp)
Technique: manually pleated and heat set plain weave
provenance: The Museum of Modern Art; 2002: acquired by Museum
dimensions: Warp x Weft (average): 487.7 x 108 cm (16 ft. x 42 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of The Museum of Modern Art, courtesy of the designer
description: Yardage of full manufactured width, yellow semi-transparent and plain woven polyester with irregular pleats.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Mica", ca. 1995–98. Medium: polyester fiber (weft), polyester slit film (warp)
Technique: manually pleated and heat set plain weave. Gift of The Museum of Modern Art, courtesy of the designer. 2002-17-3.
